Do you want to learn English quickly? MosaLingua is the method you need. Innovative and effective, our English course application has helped more than 8,000,000 people worldwide learn English by dedicating only 10 minutes of revisions a day and with tangible results in no time.   It is an ideal tool for those who want to speak English quickly and without wasting time with long and boring English courses. The MosaLingua application - learning English will help you practice English any occasion, since our method will accompany you during your travels, work and during everyday life.   MOST OUTSTANDING OF MOSALINGUA:  1) Useful and practical content: Do not waste time with notions that will not give you results. Learn 20% of the necessary English vocabulary in 80% of situations! In addition, you will decide what content you want to learn and discard the one that does not interest you.   2) Innovative method and based on scientific studies: Our international team is composed of expert polyglots that have tested the most modern learning and memorization techniques (space repetition system, active recall, metacognition, etc.) for your English course.   3) Secured accompaniment during your learning: To help you succeed in your learning, we will provide you with tips that contain small English lessons to learn English vocabulary effectively.   4) Learn while having fun: Get quick results by studying English and playfully. Each of your progress will increase your MOTIVATION, an essential element in all learning.   If you want to learn English for free, download now MosaLingua English: You will not regret it!   You will find in MosaLingua English:  More than 3600 learning cards that contain useful words and phrases to practice English  All English words and phrases are pronounced by native speakers  Learning tips and tricks to learn English and progress quickly  Essential grammar: English course, conjugation, irregular verbs, learning tips ...  17 dialogues in English: scenes of everyday life situations and during a trip, which they could use to practice English.  English vocabulary from level A1 to B2: MosaLingua includes vocabulary for levels A1 (initial learning) through B2 (intermediate-advanced) of the Common European Framework for languages.
